javadoc.text: * Target of a streaming DoubleBuffer3D into which data is flushed upon buffer overflow.
javadoc.author: wolfgang.hoschek@cern.ch

javadoc.text: * Adds all specified (x,y,z) points to the receiver.
javadoc.param: x the x-coordinates of the points to be added.
y the y-coordinates of the points to be added.
z the z-coordinates of the points to be added.
